original:
Hmph, my my... You just don't 
know when to give up.
You remind me of myself when
I was younger.
Remember this: that stubborn drive
to not give in...
...will be your ultimate power, the 
key to your survival as a Tamer!
translation:
Hmph, my my... You just don't 
know when to give up.
You remind me of myself when
I was younger.
Remember this: that stubborn drive
to not give in...
...will be your ultimate power, the 
key to your survival as a Tamer!

original:
I expect both of you to give it your 
all in a fair and exciting battle!
translation:
I expect both of you to give it your 
all in a fair and exciting battle!

original:
Ready...
...Fight!
translation:
Ready...
...Fight!

original:
Blasting through Round 1,
the winner is ^P!
This victory is grants them a Rank
Up... to Bronze Tamer!
translation:
Blasting through Round 1,
the winner is ^P!
This victory is grants them a Rank
Up... to Bronze Tamer!

original:
Hmph... Very well. You gave it your
all and came out victorious.
I guess this time I'll admit defeat
to you, ^P.
Besides, I'm getting a little to old 
to be fighting Selectors, now...
...so the rest is up to you now, 
got it?
translation:
Hmph... Very well. You gave it your
all and came out victorious.
I guess this time I'll admit defeat
to you, ^P.
Besides, I'm getting a little to old 
to be fighting Selectors, now...
...so the rest is up to you now, 
got it?

original:
^P will now be moving on
to Round 2!
Tamer, while registering for the 
next round at the front desk, 
make sure to collect your Rank 
Up Reward from the counter!
translation:
^P will now be moving on
to Round 2!
Tamer, while registering for the 
next round at the front desk, 
make sure to collect your Rank 
Up Reward from the counter!

original:
The winner is Crear! Showing that
age is no issue in being a Tamer!
translation:
The winner is Crear! Showing that
age is no issue in being a Tamer!

original:
Heh, a King wouldn't be defeated 
by such a young upstart!
Though you did manage to trip 
me up once before...
However, I'll give you one piece of
advice, ^P...
It's not a loss until you admit to
yourself that it's a loss!
translation:
Heh, a King wouldn't be defeated 
by such a young upstart!
Though you did manage to trip 
me up once before...
However, I'll give you one piece of
advice, ^P...
It's not a loss until you admit to
yourself that it's a loss!

original:
Once you admit your defeat, you
become a loser.
However, the way I think about it,
^P,
Is that it's not a loss, but a victory
you have yet to attain!
translation:
Once you admit your defeat, you
become a loser.
However, the way I think about it,
^P,
Is that it's not a loss, but a victory
you have yet to attain!

original:
It's hard to say whether that was 
good advice or something else,
But Crear's unremitting attitude 
comes as no surprise!
^P can definitely learn from
that unrelenting spirit!
translation:
It's hard to say whether that was 
good advice or something else,
But Crear's unremitting attitude 
comes as no surprise!
^P can definitely learn from
that unrelenting spirit!

original:
Thank you all for waiting!

It's now time to begin Round 2 of 
the World Championship.
This time, it's Silver Tamer Rank 
that's up for grabs!
Tamers, please step up to the 
Battle Stage!
translation:
Thank you all for waiting!

It's now time to begin Round 2 of 
the World Championship.
This time, it's Silver Tamer Rank 
that's up for grabs!
Tamers, please step up to the 
Battle Stage!

original:
Showing overwhelming strength, 
we have Super Rookie ^P!
And their opponent is...

The Digital World's number one
High-Tension Tamer,
Facile...!
translation:
Showing overwhelming strength, 
we have Super Rookie ^P!
And their opponent is...

The Digital World's number one
High-Tension Tamer,
Facile...!

original:
With me as your opponent, your
journey ends here!
I'll make things easy and pin you to
the ground in one hit!
You better brace yourself!
Yeaaaaah!
translation:
With me as your opponent, your
journey ends here!
I'll make things easy and pin you to
the ground in one hit!
You better brace yourself!
Yeaaaaah!

original:
No matter how many times you 
try, you're no match for me! 
I'm gonna give you a life lesson, 
about how there are some things
you'll never overcome... like me!
Yeaaaaah!
translation:
No matter how many times you 
try, you're no match for me! 
I'm gonna give you a life lesson, 
about how there are some things
you'll never overcome... like me!
Yeaaaaah!

original:
Looks like Facile is already
raring to go!
Can ^P show us their
true power in this match, too?!
translation:
Looks like Facile is already
raring to go!
Can ^P show us their
true power in this match, too?!

original:
Ready...
...Fight!
translation:
Ready...
...Fight!

original:
Blazing through Round 2, the winner
is... ^P!
This means they've now Ranked Up
yet again, this time to Silver Tamer!
translation:
Blazing through Round 2, the winner
is... ^P!
This means they've now Ranked Up
yet again, this time to Silver Tamer!

original:
Grrr...!
Unbelievable!
Fine, I admit you're strong, but
you lack character!
You'll never become a charismatic
Tamer like that, you know?!
Keep that in mind!
translation:
Grrr...!
Unbelievable!
Fine, I admit you're strong, but
you lack character!
You'll never become a charismatic
Tamer like that, you know?!
Keep that in mind!

original:
Unfortunately Facile's High-Tension
Style couldn't quite make the cut!
Was all that tough talk and parting
threats for naught?!
Alright now, ^P!

While registering for the 
next round at the front desk, 
make sure to collect your Rank 
Up Reward from the counter!
translation:
Unfortunately Facile's High-Tension
Style couldn't quite make the cut!
Was all that tough talk and parting
threats for naught?!
Alright now, ^P!

While registering for the 
next round at the front desk, 
make sure to collect your Rank 
Up Reward from the counter!

original:
And the winner is... Facile!
Unbelieveable!
She's managed to surpass this 
rookie with energy and vigour alone!
translation:
And the winner is... Facile!
Unbelieveable!
She's managed to surpass this 
rookie with energy and vigour alone!

original:
Hey now, why do you have to be
so rude about it?!
Hey, ^P!

Has this given you a taste of my 
true power?!
translation:
Hey now, why do you have to be
so rude about it?!
Hey, ^P!

Has this given you a taste of my 
true power?!

original:
Energy and high tension can 
become your strength in battle!
Now that you've lost to them, I 
hope this taught you something!
translation:
Energy and high tension can 
become your strength in battle!
Now that you've lost to them, I 
hope this taught you something!

original:
^P put in an amazing effort
in today's match! Good effort!
You can register and re-enter as 
many times as you need, 
So try again once you've gotten 
stronger!
translation:
^P put in an amazing effort
in today's match! Good effort!
You can register and re-enter as 
many times as you need, 
So try again once you've gotten 
stronger!

original:
To decide the strongest Tamer, 
this is the World Championship!
With the Gold Tamer Rank Up 
riding on the outcome, 
We're starting the first of 
today's two Semifinal matches!
Tamers, please step up to the 
Battle Stage!
translation:
To decide the strongest Tamer, 
this is the World Championship!
With the Gold Tamer Rank Up 
riding on the outcome, 
We're starting the first of 
today's two Semifinal matches!
Tamers, please step up to the 
Battle Stage!

original:
Today, Super Rookie ^P
will be going up against...
The Tamer partnered with a 
Legendary Digimon! 
Skill! Strength! 
Brains! Style! 
The pinnacle of perfection, 
the definition of High Quality, 
It's the Super Dark Hero!
Beelzemon Blast Mode!
translation:
Today, Super Rookie ^P
will be going up against...
The Tamer partnered with a 
Legendary Digimon! 
Skill! Strength! 
Brains! Style! 
The pinnacle of perfection, 
the definition of High Quality, 
It's the Super Dark Hero!
Beelzemon Blast Mode!

original:
...hey!
I have a name, you know!
You didn't introduce anyone except
my Digimon! What about me?!
translation:
...hey!
I have a name, you know!
You didn't introduce anyone except
my Digimon! What about me?!

original:
Aw c'mon, just "the Tamer"?!
I have a name too, you know!
You're supposed to introduce the 
Tamer properly, THEN the Digimon!
translation:
Aw c'mon, just "the Tamer"?!
I have a name too, you know!
You're supposed to introduce the 
Tamer properly, THEN the Digimon!

original:
Sounds like the Colosseum is 
getting all fired up for this match!
This will be a battle that you 
absolutely cannot miss!
translation:
Sounds like the Colosseum is 
getting all fired up for this match!
This will be a battle that you 
absolutely cannot miss!

original:
Ready...
...Fight!
translation:
Ready...
...Fight!

original:
They've done it! ^P, the 
rising star, takes the win!
They've won against Beelzemon,
and in Blast Mode, at that!
Truly a spectacular performance!
translation:
They've done it! ^P, the 
rising star, takes the win!
They've won against Beelzemon,
and in Blast Mode, at that!
Truly a spectacular performance!

original:
...seriously, what the heck? 

You're trying a little too hard
to ignore my existence...
Is this meant to be some kind of 
joke?
translation:
...seriously, what the heck? 

You're trying a little too hard
to ignore my existence...
Is this meant to be some kind of 
joke?

original:
If you lose to me again, you'll never
be able to rank up!
Go back, re-enter, then fight me 
again!
Sounds tedious, right...?
Well then, you'd better snap to it!
translation:
If you lose to me again, you'll never
be able to rank up!
Go back, re-enter, then fight me 
again!
Sounds tedious, right...?
Well then, you'd better snap to it!

original:
The SemiFinals will be settled with
this next match!
Just one more win to get that 
coveted Gold Tamer Rank!
Does ^P have the strength
to stand up to the Selectors?!
And just who will their next 
opponent be?!
This legendary Tamer takes
strength to the next level!
The unbridled Number One, 
the super spectacular Digimon...
Omnimon...!
translation:
The SemiFinals will be settled with
this next match!
Just one more win to get that 
coveted Gold Tamer Rank!
Does ^P have the strength
to stand up to the Selectors?!
And just who will their next 
opponent be?!
This legendary Tamer takes
strength to the next level!
The unbridled Number One, 
the super spectacular Digimon...
Omnimon...!

original:
Yo, ^P.

I look forward to an interesting
match.
translation:
Yo, ^P.

I look forward to an interesting
match.

original:
Let's have another good
match, ^P.
translation:
Let's have another good
match, ^P.

original:
Both Tamers have agreed to a fair
and exciting battle!
Quietly yet unfailingly, 
these two burn bright!
translation:
Both Tamers have agreed to a fair
and exciting battle!
Quietly yet unfailingly, 
these two burn bright!

original:
Ready...
...Fight!
translation:
Ready...
...Fight!

original:
And the winner is...
Beelz- I mean, Arville!
^P has lost!
translation:
And the winner is...
Beelz- I mean, Arville!
^P has lost!

original:
Hey, you definitely just said 
'Beelz-' then, didn't you...?!
You were clearly about to proclaim
Beelzemon as the winner!
Is this how you treat your
Tamers?! Jeez!
translation:
Hey, you definitely just said 
'Beelz-' then, didn't you...?!
You were clearly about to proclaim
Beelzemon as the winner!
Is this how you treat your
Tamers?! Jeez!

original:
There you go with 'Beelz-' again!
You're doing it on purpose!
How on earth could you mix up
'Arville' and 'Beelzemon'?!
translation:
There you go with 'Beelz-' again!
You're doing it on purpose!
How on earth could you mix up
'Arville' and 'Beelzemon'?!

original:
U-Umm... I apologize for that...
A-anyway...
It's too bad for ^P,
taking the loss!
We look forward to seeing you take
on the challenge again sometime!
translation:
U-Umm... I apologize for that...
A-anyway...
It's too bad for ^P,
taking the loss!
We look forward to seeing you take
on the challenge again sometime!

original:
Busting through the SemiFinals,
the winner is ^P!
Incredible! You've managed to 
make it this far!
You've now earned yourself the 
rank of Gold Tamer!
translation:
Busting through the SemiFinals,
the winner is ^P!
Incredible! You've managed to 
make it this far!
You've now earned yourself the 
rank of Gold Tamer!

original:
It was a fantastic battle,
thank you, ^P.
What the Digital World needs 
right now...
Isn't some old legend dug out 
from the Archives.
What it needs is a Tamer like you,
who'll shape the future!
Well, I guess your next goal will be
the title of Digital World Champion. 
And with it, the Platinum Rank.
...And I know you can do it.
translation:
It was a fantastic battle,
thank you, ^P.
What the Digital World needs 
right now...
Isn't some old legend dug out 
from the Archives.
What it needs is a Tamer like you,
who'll shape the future!
Well, I guess your next goal will be
the title of Digital World Champion. 
And with it, the Platinum Rank.
...And I know you can do it.

original:
We're getting close to the summit 
of the Digital World!
Will ^P be able to reach it?!

Please collect your reward for
ranking up at the Entrance,
And be sure to enter the Final
Match!
translation:
We're getting close to the summit 
of the Digital World!
Will ^P be able to reach it?!

Please collect your reward for
ranking up at the Entrance,
And be sure to enter the Final
Match!

original:
Oh my, and the winner is...
Jegal!
This is an unexpected loss for
^P!
translation:
Oh my, and the winner is...
Jegal!
This is an unexpected loss for
^P!

original:
'Unexpected'... That goes for me,
too.
Not just my win, but moreso 
your loss...
Having said that, you're not the
type to just roll over, right?
No matter how many attempts it 
takes you, I'll be right here waiting.
translation:
'Unexpected'... That goes for me,
too.
Not just my win, but moreso 
your loss...
Having said that, you're not the
type to just roll over, right?
No matter how many attempts it 
takes you, I'll be right here waiting.

original:
Did I expect too much from you?
I'm not really sure...
But this wasn't really your
true strength just now, was it?
I'll be waiting for you here, when
you're ready to try again.
translation:
Did I expect too much from you?
I'm not really sure...
But this wasn't really your
true strength just now, was it?
I'll be waiting for you here, when
you're ready to try again.

original:
So close! ^P was so close
to earning Gold Tamer Rank, 
but it slipped through their fingers.
Even still, it's just like Jegal said:
We'll all be eagerly awaiting your
rematch, ^P!
translation:
So close! ^P was so close
to earning Gold Tamer Rank, 
but it slipped through their fingers.
Even still, it's just like Jegal said:
We'll all be eagerly awaiting your
rematch, ^P!

original:
We've arrived at the Finals Match 
of the World Championship!
The rise in rank to Platinum Tamer 
is riding on the results of...
These upcoming intense 
back-to-back battles!
Tamers, please step up to the 
stage!
translation:
We've arrived at the Finals Match 
of the World Championship!
The rise in rank to Platinum Tamer 
is riding on the results of...
These upcoming intense 
back-to-back battles!
Tamers, please step up to the 
stage!

original:
Rising through the ranks, we have 
the fearsome rookie ^P!
Will they end up in the spotlight as
Champion of the Digital World?!
And can they become the only 
Platinum Tamer in existence?!
Their opponent is the skillful Super
Rookie who managed to take down
the once-undefeatable combo of 
BanchoLeomon and Ace!
translation:
Rising through the ranks, we have 
the fearsome rookie ^P!
Will they end up in the spotlight as
Champion of the Digital World?!
And can they become the only 
Platinum Tamer in existence?!
Their opponent is the skillful Super
Rookie who managed to take down
the once-undefeatable combo of 
BanchoLeomon and Ace!

original:
Ah... I have to admit, this isn't
what I was expecting. 
I'm struggling to believe it myself. 

On top of that, to be facing you,
^P, in a place like this...
Well, it feels weird saying this, 
but... don't underestimate me. 
Drop your guard, even for a 
moment... and you'll regret it, ok?
translation:
Ah... I have to admit, this isn't
what I was expecting. 
I'm struggling to believe it myself. 

On top of that, to be facing you,
^P, in a place like this...
Well, it feels weird saying this, 
but... don't underestimate me. 
Drop your guard, even for a 
moment... and you'll regret it, ok?

original:
Aha... This is definitely not how I'd
pictured things happening...
It's a bit hard to believe, isn't it?

And to be facing you, ^P, 
in a place like this...
It feels a little weird saying this, 
but... don't underestimate me! 
Let your guard down for even a 
second and I'll make you regret it!
translation:
Aha... This is definitely not how I'd
pictured things happening...
It's a bit hard to believe, isn't it?

And to be facing you, ^P, 
in a place like this...
It feels a little weird saying this, 
but... don't underestimate me! 
Let your guard down for even a 
second and I'll make you regret it!

original: Don't let me down, alright?
translation: Don't let me down, alright?

original: Don't disappoint me, 'kay?
translation: Don't disappoint me, 'kay?

original:
Folks, they're speaking calmly, but
their eyes tell a different story!
Their fighting spirits are so strong,
sparks fly between them!
They're ready to go head-to-head, 
so let the battle begin!
translation:
Folks, they're speaking calmly, but
their eyes tell a different story!
Their fighting spirits are so strong,
sparks fly between them!
They're ready to go head-to-head, 
so let the battle begin!

original:
Ready...
...Fight!
translation:
Ready...
...Fight!

original:
And the winner is ^P!
What a spectacular performance!
What's this? Their opponent also 
seems happy with this outcome...?
translation:
And the winner is ^P!
What a spectacular performance!
What's this? Their opponent also 
seems happy with this outcome...?

original:
You bet!
That battle was a ton of fun!
For the first time in my life, I felt
the desire to keep on fighting!
I think I finally understand how
Ace... How BanchoLeomon felt.
Thank you, ^P, 
I'm glad to have met you.
translation:
You bet!
That battle was a ton of fun!
For the first time in my life, I felt
the desire to keep on fighting!
I think I finally understand how
Ace... How BanchoLeomon felt.
Thank you, ^P, 
I'm glad to have met you.

original:
Of course!
That battle was so much fun!
For the first time in my life, I felt
the desire to just keep fighting!
I think I finally understand how
Ace... How BanchoLeomon felt.
Thank you, ^P, 
I'm so happy to have met you.
translation:
Of course!
That battle was so much fun!
For the first time in my life, I felt
the desire to just keep fighting!
I think I finally understand how
Ace... How BanchoLeomon felt.
Thank you, ^P, 
I'm so happy to have met you.

original:
While I'd love to battle with you
even one more time...
You beat me, so you should press 
onwards!
Starting all over again wouldn't
suit you, after all, now would it?
translation:
While I'd love to battle with you
even one more time...
You beat me, so you should press 
onwards!
Starting all over again wouldn't
suit you, after all, now would it?

original:
While I'd love to battle with you
even just once more...
You beat me, so you need to
continue forward!
Starting over from scratch 
wouldn't suit you, anyway!
translation:
While I'd love to battle with you
even just once more...
You beat me, so you need to
continue forward!
Starting over from scratch 
wouldn't suit you, anyway!

original:
The road to World Champion, 
and the Platinum Tamer Rank, 
is down to just one more match!
Super Rookie ^P!
Your final match is against 
a literal "living legend"!
A mysterious group of Tamers, 
undefeated until their retirement,
hailing from the the time of 
the original Tamer Union! 
Gold Tamers with nigh-invincible 
Mega-level Digimon at their side!
Defeating them ensures your
acceptance as Platinum rank!
Now! Here! They! Are!
translation:
The road to World Champion, 
and the Platinum Tamer Rank, 
is down to just one more match!
Super Rookie ^P!
Your final match is against 
a literal "living legend"!
A mysterious group of Tamers, 
undefeated until their retirement,
hailing from the the time of 
the original Tamer Union! 
Gold Tamers with nigh-invincible 
Mega-level Digimon at their side!
Defeating them ensures your
acceptance as Platinum rank!
Now! Here! They! Are!

original:
...We've kept you fools waiting, 
haven't we? It's us, the Bandits!
translation:
...We've kept you fools waiting, 
haven't we? It's us, the Bandits!

original:
Enough already!
We've beaten you once already!
Haven't you had enough, yet?!
We won't allow you to win!
translation:
Enough already!
We've beaten you once already!
Haven't you had enough, yet?!
We won't allow you to win!

original:
Judging from the atmosphere...

I get the feeling no one was really
expecting us, huh...?
translation:
Judging from the atmosphere...

I get the feeling no one was really
expecting us, huh...?

original:
Well, as Tamers, we have lost
pretty frequently, haven't we?
translation:
Well, as Tamers, we have lost
pretty frequently, haven't we?

original:
Whoa... everyone's gone silent...
This is so awkward...!
translation:
Whoa... everyone's gone silent...
This is so awkward...!

original:
It can't be helped, especially as 
we're not technically Tamers now.
translation:
It can't be helped, especially as 
we're not technically Tamers now.

original:
Both parties are expected to
engage in a fair fight... okay...?
translation:
Both parties are expected to
engage in a fair fight... okay...?

original:
Enough of your blabbering!
When it comes to battle,
It's either you win and survive,
or you end up kicking the bucket!
Though in reality, it's not the 
Tamers who suffer...
Only their Digimon...!
translation:
Enough of your blabbering!
When it comes to battle,
It's either you win and survive,
or you end up kicking the bucket!
Though in reality, it's not the 
Tamers who suffer...
Only their Digimon...!

original:
Just look at how far fighting 'fair'
gets you!
No matter how hard you try,
nothing will change!
Just give up already!
translation:
Just look at how far fighting 'fair'
gets you!
No matter how hard you try,
nothing will change!
Just give up already!

original:
Oh my, it appears...

The Bandits have shapeshifted
into their Monster Mode...!
translation:
Oh my, it appears...

The Bandits have shapeshifted
into their Monster Mode...!

original:
Of the first wave of Tamers
who vanished from this world,
We Numbers are the only
survivors left...
By the time we finally awoke, 
everyone we knew was gone.
Except for the Numbers left 
in this monstrous form...
the "fair" ones... not one 
of them survived!
translation:
Of the first wave of Tamers
who vanished from this world,
We Numbers are the only
survivors left...
By the time we finally awoke, 
everyone we knew was gone.
Except for the Numbers left 
in this monstrous form...
the "fair" ones... not one 
of them survived!

original:
As Tamers, we were nothing
but failures, anyway.
We get by better by doing the
fighting ourselves!
We no longer have partners, so
we'll show you our true power!
translation:
As Tamers, we were nothing
but failures, anyway.
We get by better by doing the
fighting ourselves!
We no longer have partners, so
we'll show you our true power!

original:
We'll tell you this one more time,
^P,
If you don't want to lose anyone,
hurry and return to the Real World!
translation:
We'll tell you this one more time,
^P,
If you don't want to lose anyone,
hurry and return to the Real World!

original:
^P, if you continue to 
disappoint us,
We'll strike you down, right here
and now!
translation:
^P, if you continue to 
disappoint us,
We'll strike you down, right here
and now!

original:
And the winner is... Shuu!
^P has been defeated!
translation:
And the winner is... Shuu!
^P has been defeated!

original:
And the winner is... Kizuna!
^P has been defeated!
translation:
And the winner is... Kizuna!
^P has been defeated!

original:
...................
I'm disappointed, ^P.
To think the battle I dreamed of
having turned out like this...
translation:
...................
I'm disappointed, ^P.
To think the battle I dreamed of
having turned out like this...

original:
...................
I'm disappointed, ^P.
To think the battle I dreamed of
having turned out like this...
translation:
...................
I'm disappointed, ^P.
To think the battle I dreamed of
having turned out like this...

original:
You can't let things end like this,
can you...?
But if this really is all you can
muster...
Then don't bother coming back.
translation:
You can't let things end like this,
can you...?
But if this really is all you can
muster...
Then don't bother coming back.

original:
You can't let things end like this,
can you...?
But if this really is all you can
do...
Then don't worry about coming
back.
translation:
You can't let things end like this,
can you...?
But if this really is all you can
do...
Then don't worry about coming
back.

original:
Isn't that quite the harsh 
comment?!
Though truthfully, these harsh but
passionate words...
Might help ^P outgrow their
naivety and try again!
How will ^P respond
to this?!
translation:
Isn't that quite the harsh 
comment?!
Though truthfully, these harsh but
passionate words...
Might help ^P outgrow their
naivety and try again!
How will ^P respond
to this?!

original:
And the winner is... ^P!
They've done it!
They've managed to achieve the
title of World Champion,
And received the Platinum Tamer
rank!
translation:
And the winner is... ^P!
They've done it!
They've managed to achieve the
title of World Champion,
And received the Platinum Tamer
rank!

original:
Hmph, its as I thought...
You possess great power.
A Tamer that can stand toe to
toe against the Selectors...
I guess that leaves just you alone
able to do the job.
The question is whether you 
understand that yourself or not...
translation:
Hmph, its as I thought...
You possess great power.
A Tamer that can stand toe to
toe against the Selectors...
I guess that leaves just you alone
able to do the job.
The question is whether you 
understand that yourself or not...

original:
We have some business to settle
with the boss of the Selectors.
For that, we required some fresh
bait.
No one knows who the leader of
the Selectors truly is...
We've been searching this entire 
time, but we've met with nothing.
That's why we need you to be
our bait.
We're counting on you, ^P.
Give it your all!
translation:
We have some business to settle
with the boss of the Selectors.
For that, we required some fresh
bait.
No one knows who the leader of
the Selectors truly is...
We've been searching this entire 
time, but we've met with nothing.
That's why we need you to be
our bait.
We're counting on you, ^P.
Give it your all!

original:
What a pair of fantastic rivals,
they put on a brilliant show!
Everyone! Please give them all
a huge round of applause!
.......................

I've just been informed that the
leader of the Tamer Union,
Kernel, himself, has an important
announcement to make.
Please listen politely, everyone!
translation:
What a pair of fantastic rivals,
they put on a brilliant show!
Everyone! Please give them all
a huge round of applause!
.......................

I've just been informed that the
leader of the Tamer Union,
Kernel, himself, has an important
announcement to make.
Please listen politely, everyone!

original:
And the winner is...
The Bandits...
translation:
And the winner is...
The Bandits...

original:
While talking about fairness makes
you look good,
There's no meaning to it when you
lose!
When a Tamer loses, it means
their Digimon also loses.
And the ones in actual pain are
the Digimon themselves!
If you don't understand that, then
you should quit being a Tamer!
translation:
While talking about fairness makes
you look good,
There's no meaning to it when you
lose!
When a Tamer loses, it means
their Digimon also loses.
And the ones in actual pain are
the Digimon themselves!
If you don't understand that, then
you should quit being a Tamer!

original:
So that's all you've got, huh...
Then we have no use for you.
Go join all those other worthless
small fry over there.
translation:
So that's all you've got, huh...
Then we have no use for you.
Go join all those other worthless
small fry over there.

original:
Well then, ^P,
We'll wait for you to try again.
Since, well... it doesn't seem right
to leave things as they are...
translation:
Well then, ^P,
We'll wait for you to try again.
Since, well... it doesn't seem right
to leave things as they are...

original:
Today we're stepping into never
before seen territory!
It's the rank up match for the
Legend Tamer rank!
The pinnacle of Tamer achievement,
a legendary rank only reachable
by a select few, even among
Platinum Tamers!
Can both participants please 
step onto the stage!
translation:
Today we're stepping into never
before seen territory!
It's the rank up match for the
Legend Tamer rank!
The pinnacle of Tamer achievement,
a legendary rank only reachable
by a select few, even among
Platinum Tamers!
Can both participants please 
step onto the stage!

original:
While ^P has been winning
battles left and right,
Their next opponent won't go down
so easily!
Back when there were still many
Tamers in the Digital World...
She acted as leader of a large
group within the Tamer Union!
It's Chief Julia...!
translation:
While ^P has been winning
battles left and right,
Their next opponent won't go down
so easily!
Back when there were still many
Tamers in the Digital World...
She acted as leader of a large
group within the Tamer Union!
It's Chief Julia...!

original:
The feeling of being called a living
legend...
Want to know what that feels like?
I'll gladly show you.
translation:
The feeling of being called a living
legend...
Want to know what that feels like?
I'll gladly show you.

original:
I see you've returned to show me
your power once again...
However, if you can't win against
me, who's simply archived data...
Then I don't believe there's a
future for you in this world.
translation:
I see you've returned to show me
your power once again...
However, if you can't win against
me, who's simply archived data...
Then I don't believe there's a
future for you in this world.

original:
Not that I have to tell either of you
to fight fairly, but...
May the two of you engage in a 
fair and exciting match!
translation:
Not that I have to tell either of you
to fight fairly, but...
May the two of you engage in a 
fair and exciting match!

original:
Ready...
...Fight!
translation:
Ready...
...Fight!

original:
And the winner is... ^P!

They've taken the first step 
towards the title of Legend Tamer!
translation:
And the winner is... ^P!

They've taken the first step 
towards the title of Legend Tamer!

original:
Work hard and earn the title of
Legend Tamer, got it?
I never wanted to be called a
legend by anyone...
Because I was still so young...

Having lost my true self, I feel
that even more so, now.
translation:
Work hard and earn the title of
Legend Tamer, got it?
I never wanted to be called a
legend by anyone...
Because I was still so young...

Having lost my true self, I feel
that even more so, now.

original:
With this, you've managed to 
overcome one of the legends!
While its obvious you possess
great power...
What you'll be tested on next is...
Your feelings.
translation:
With this, you've managed to 
overcome one of the legends!
While its obvious you possess
great power...
What you'll be tested on next is...
Your feelings.

original:
^P is just a few steps 
away from the title of Legend!
As for their next opponent,
He's another legendary leader.
Having led the old Tamer Union 
together with Chief Julia...
It's Chief Glare...!
translation:
^P is just a few steps 
away from the title of Legend!
As for their next opponent,
He's another legendary leader.
Having led the old Tamer Union 
together with Chief Julia...
It's Chief Glare...!

original:
I never expected to set foot in 
this Colosseum again.
I don't know whether to laugh or 
cry... it's a strange feeling.
Right now, all I am is plain old
archived data,
But I'll be sure to give you a good
fight, at the very least.
translation:
I never expected to set foot in 
this Colosseum again.
I don't know whether to laugh or 
cry... it's a strange feeling.
Right now, all I am is plain old
archived data,
But I'll be sure to give you a good
fight, at the very least.

original:
Come now, ^P! 
Show me one more time...
Whether you can overcome another
old legend...
Show me whether you have that 
potential!
translation:
Come now, ^P! 
Show me one more time...
Whether you can overcome another
old legend...
Show me whether you have that 
potential!

original:
Not that I have to say this, but 
may you two engage in a fair fight!
translation:
Not that I have to say this, but 
may you two engage in a fair fight!

original:
Ready now...
...Fight!
translation:
Ready now...
...Fight!

original:
And the winner is... Chief Julia!
An expected outcome, of course!
She's truly shown the clear 
difference between them!
translation:
And the winner is... Chief Julia!
An expected outcome, of course!
She's truly shown the clear 
difference between them!

original:
........................

I do not believe that you have lost
to me.
No, you have lost to the power and 
weight of the legend itself.
No matter your skill, it can only
take you so far.
translation:
........................

I do not believe that you have lost
to me.
No, you have lost to the power and 
weight of the legend itself.
No matter your skill, it can only
take you so far.

original:
Defeating us is akin to overcoming
a legend...
Surely you didn't believe it would
be so simple?
But don't worry... I know you can
become a legend someday.
translation:
Defeating us is akin to overcoming
a legend...
Surely you didn't believe it would
be so simple?
But don't worry... I know you can
become a legend someday.

original:
Some words of encouragement to
^P from Chief Julia!
Her expectations of this young
Tamer are quite clear!
Don't stop here, please do take
on the challenge again!
translation:
Some words of encouragement to
^P from Chief Julia!
Her expectations of this young
Tamer are quite clear!
Don't stop here, please do take
on the challenge again!

original:
And the winner is ^P!
They've done it!
They're just a single step away 
from the title of Legend Tamer!
translation:
And the winner is ^P!
They've done it!
They're just a single step away 
from the title of Legend Tamer!

original:
It's so strange, ^P...

For some reason, I feel such 
frustration about losing to you.
But I'm just some archived data 
that's been stored in the library...
Does a heart still exist somewhere
within me...?
translation:
It's so strange, ^P...

For some reason, I feel such 
frustration about losing to you.
But I'm just some archived data 
that's been stored in the library...
Does a heart still exist somewhere
within me...?

original:
You've managed to successfully
overcome us.
You're so close... don't let your
focus slip at the finish line.
Your final opponent is the real deal.
translation:
You've managed to successfully
overcome us.
You're so close... don't let your
focus slip at the finish line.
Your final opponent is the real deal.

original:
The final challenger has arrived!

A figure that I'm sure none of us 
can ever forget...
It's Kernel...!
translation:
The final challenger has arrived!

A figure that I'm sure none of us 
can ever forget...
It's Kernel...!

original:
Hey, ^P...
I really owe you.
I am here now, not as the boss
of the Selectors...
But as a regular Tamer who wishes
to challenge you.
translation:
Hey, ^P...
I really owe you.
I am here now, not as the boss
of the Selectors...
But as a regular Tamer who wishes
to challenge you.

original:
No matter when, no matter how 
often, I'll accept your challenge.
Now, shall we get started?
translation:
No matter when, no matter how 
often, I'll accept your challenge.
Now, shall we get started?

original:
A data copy of one of the original
engineers of the Digital World, 
Left behind on Archive Island so 
long ago...
Kernel...

He may have lost the power to 
change this world, but...
As ^P's final 
opponent...
There can be no opponent more 
challenging than him!
translation:
A data copy of one of the original
engineers of the Digital World, 
Left behind on Archive Island so 
long ago...
Kernel...

He may have lost the power to 
change this world, but...
As ^P's final 
opponent...
There can be no opponent more 
challenging than him!

original:
Will this be ^P's final
battle?!
Ready...
...Fight!
translation:
Will this be ^P's final
battle?!
Ready...
...Fight!

original:
And the winner is... Chief Glare!
^P has taken the loss!
It was a close match, but 
^P couldn't quite cut it!
translation:
And the winner is... Chief Glare!
^P has taken the loss!
It was a close match, but 
^P couldn't quite cut it!

original:
You would have won without a
doubt with a little more effort.
But... I'll let you in on a little secret.

It's much more fun to have
something to chase after.
Once you're the one being chased,
you can never stop or slow down.
You'll understand some day...
translation:
You would have won without a
doubt with a little more effort.
But... I'll let you in on a little secret.

It's much more fun to have
something to chase after.
Once you're the one being chased,
you can never stop or slow down.
You'll understand some day...

original:
You're beginning to get a feel 
for your own power, aren't you? 
Keep your composure when you 
fight and victory will be yours.
If you can't win however...
Maybe that means you're not 
ready to take on the responsibility
of becoming a Legendary Tamer.
translation:
You're beginning to get a feel 
for your own power, aren't you? 
Keep your composure when you 
fight and victory will be yours.
If you can't win however...
Maybe that means you're not 
ready to take on the responsibility
of becoming a Legendary Tamer.

original:
It's too bad, ^P...

Please do take up the challenge
again!
translation:
It's too bad, ^P...

Please do take up the challenge
again!

original:
And the winner is... ^P!
They've finally done it!
They've defeated everyone who's
stood in their way!
They've finally attained the 
legendary rank of Legend Tamer!
translation:
And the winner is... ^P!
They've finally done it!
They've defeated everyone who's
stood in their way!
They've finally attained the 
legendary rank of Legend Tamer!

original:
I had no doubt that you were an
extraordinary Tamer, but....
Now you're one of the greatest
Tamers to exist in this World.
Congratulations, ^P,
and thank you.
translation:
I had no doubt that you were an
extraordinary Tamer, but....
Now you're one of the greatest
Tamers to exist in this World.
Congratulations, ^P,
and thank you.

original:
Now then, ^P...

Or should I say, Legend Tamer
^P, well done!
Be sure to collect your prize from
the desk at the entrance.
translation:
Now then, ^P...

Or should I say, Legend Tamer
^P, well done!
Be sure to collect your prize from
the desk at the entrance.

original:
And the winner is Kernel!
Too bad, ^P.
Turns out this battle was not the
final step for you!
translation:
And the winner is Kernel!
Too bad, ^P.
Turns out this battle was not the
final step for you!

original:
Thank you, ^P. Right now,
I'm... so incredibly happy.
With this, I get to battle with you 
once again.
translation:
Thank you, ^P. Right now,
I'm... so incredibly happy.
With this, I get to battle with you 
once again.

original:
It's a weird feeling, beating you
once again...
While it's a little disappointing, I 
also feel slightly relieved, as well.
Please try again, and be sure to
defeat me next time.
translation:
It's a weird feeling, beating you
once again...
While it's a little disappointing, I 
also feel slightly relieved, as well.
Please try again, and be sure to
defeat me next time.

original:
As Kernel has just said...

We're all eagerly awaiting your
rematch with him!
translation:
As Kernel has just said...

We're all eagerly awaiting your
rematch with him!

original:
First, I'd like to praise every 
participant for their effort!
We now have a Champion to carry 
the responsibilities of a new era!
As well as the only Platinum 
Tamer in existence!
I, Kernel, would like to announce
this here and now!
From now on, we, the new Tamer
Union...
Will lead the Tamer teams we 
have been training until now,
And we shall be launching a
counterattack on the Selectors!
translation:
First, I'd like to praise every 
participant for their effort!
We now have a Champion to carry 
the responsibilities of a new era!
As well as the only Platinum 
Tamer in existence!
I, Kernel, would like to announce
this here and now!
From now on, we, the new Tamer
Union...
Will lead the Tamer teams we 
have been training until now,
And we shall be launching a
counterattack on the Selectors!

original:
I sincerely apologize for keeping
you all waiting!
The future of the Digital World
will now...
...Huh...?!
translation:
I sincerely apologize for keeping
you all waiting!
The future of the Digital World
will now...
...Huh...?!

original:
Checking Erase list...
......................
Kernel, leader of the rebel
group: sighted.
translation:
Checking Erase list...
......................
Kernel, leader of the rebel
group: sighted.

original:
Checking Erase list.
Checking Erase list.
Restrain all Tamers belonging to
the rebel group.
translation:
Checking Erase list.
Checking Erase list.
Restrain all Tamers belonging to
the rebel group.

original:
Checking Erase list.
Checking Erase list.
Capture all Digimon belonging to
the rebel group.
translation:
Checking Erase list.
Checking Erase list.
Capture all Digimon belonging to
the rebel group.

original:
Stay back!
Don't you dare hurt my comrades!
translation:
Stay back!
Don't you dare hurt my comrades!

original:
Checking Erase list.
Checking Erase list.
Apprehend the leader of the rebel
group.
translation:
Checking Erase list.
Checking Erase list.
Apprehend the leader of the rebel
group.

original:
48% of the rebel group's Digimon
have been captured.
32% of the rebel group's Tamers
have been restrained.
translation:
48% of the rebel group's Digimon
have been captured.
32% of the rebel group's Tamers
have been restrained.

original:
Checking Erase list.
A P-rank candidate Tamer...?
No... this one's different...
Actual Platinum Tamer sighted!
translation:
Checking Erase list.
A P-rank candidate Tamer...?
No... this one's different...
Actual Platinum Tamer sighted!

original:
Reporting to all Selectors, there is
interference from a Platinum Tamer.
.......................
translation:
Reporting to all Selectors, there is
interference from a Platinum Tamer.
.......................

original:
Message received from Selectors,
processing order to retreat...
Retreat.
Retreat.
translation:
Message received from Selectors,
processing order to retreat...
Retreat.
Retreat.

original:
86% of the rebel group's Digimon
have been captured.
92% of the rebel group's Tamers
have been restrained.
Retreat.
Retreat.
translation:
86% of the rebel group's Digimon
have been captured.
92% of the rebel group's Tamers
have been restrained.
Retreat.
Retreat.

original:
T-this is a disaster!

Every single person in the 
Colosseum...
They've been kidnapped and taken
to the Erasers' DigiShip!
translation:
T-this is a disaster!

Every single person in the 
Colosseum...
They've been kidnapped and taken
to the Erasers' DigiShip!

original:
Please, ^P!

As a Platinum Tamer, you're the
only one we can count on!
Please find out where the Erasers
are headed and save everyone!
No, please save the entire
Digital World!
translation:
Please, ^P!

As a Platinum Tamer, you're the
only one we can count on!
Please find out where the Erasers
are headed and save everyone!
No, please save the entire
Digital World!

original: I wish you luck! Stay safe!
translation: I wish you luck! Stay safe!

original:
Thank goodness you're safe,
^P!
translation:
Thank goodness you're safe,
^P!

original:
The colosseum was attacked by
the Selectors, wasn't it?!
We were watching on the monitor,
but it all happened so suddenly...
We were so scared you might have
been kidnapped, too...
translation:
The colosseum was attacked by
the Selectors, wasn't it?!
We were watching on the monitor,
but it all happened so suddenly...
We were so scared you might have
been kidnapped, too...

original:
Asuka and the others rushed off
to try and save you...
We tried to stop them, but they
just wouldn't listen...
translation:
Asuka and the others rushed off
to try and save you...
We tried to stop them, but they
just wouldn't listen...

original:
But then Yui snapped at them,
she was all,
"You'll just get in the way, so
stay here and wait!"
So now they're just sulking.
translation:
But then Yui snapped at them,
she was all,
"You'll just get in the way, so
stay here and wait!"
So now they're just sulking.

original:
Hey, ^P...

While I was certain you'd make it
out safe and sound...
Everyone really was very worried
about you,
So could you go check on them at
the entrance?
translation:
Hey, ^P...

While I was certain you'd make it
out safe and sound...
Everyone really was very worried
about you,
So could you go check on them at
the entrance?

original:
^P! I'm so glad!
I knew you'd be fine!
I know you wouldn't be defeated 
by the likes of those Selectors!
We figured you'd want to go and
find those guys right away,
So Asuka and the others are 
tracing that Ship's escape route.
translation:
^P! I'm so glad!
I knew you'd be fine!
I know you wouldn't be defeated 
by the likes of those Selectors!
We figured you'd want to go and
find those guys right away,
So Asuka and the others are 
tracing that Ship's escape route.

original:
There's no doubt they were 
headed in this direction, right...?
But isn't there just some
tiny islands there...?
translation:
There's no doubt they were 
headed in this direction, right...?
But isn't there just some
tiny islands there...?

original:
What does that mean? It's gotta 
be one of these islands, right?
So where? Here? There? How 
about over there? Gatomon??
translation:
What does that mean? It's gotta 
be one of these islands, right?
So where? Here? There? How 
about over there? Gatomon??

original: Gaaatooomooon!
translation: Gaaatooomooon!

original: Be quuuiiieeettt!
translation: Be quuuiiieeettt!

original:
We can't go there directly because 
there's no DigiPort around there!
I'm looking into the data now, so
please just be quiet!
translation:
We can't go there directly because 
there's no DigiPort around there!
I'm looking into the data now, so
please just be quiet!

original: I-I'm sorry...
translation: I-I'm sorry...

original:
H-hey now, it'll be okay...

We'll definitely figure it out!
translation:
H-hey now, it'll be okay...

We'll definitely figure it out!

original:
That's right! Gatomon's skills 
are exceptional, after all.
However... They get troubled easy,
so it may take some time.
translation:
That's right! Gatomon's skills 
are exceptional, after all.
However... They get troubled easy,
so it may take some time.

original:
Hmmm... It does look like it may
take a while...
.............................
.............................
I know! Hey, ^P,
Remember the Quest PC?
Why don't you do some 
'Quests' in the meantime?
translation:
Hmmm... It does look like it may
take a while...
.............................
.............................
I know! Hey, ^P,
Remember the Quest PC?
Why don't you do some 
'Quests' in the meantime?

original:
^P!
We've finally figured it out!
The location of the Selectors' 
Digiship, we've tracked it...!
Could you come over here for a 
second? It's, uh....
translation:
^P!
We've finally figured it out!
The location of the Selectors' 
Digiship, we've tracked it...!
Could you come over here for a 
second? It's, uh....

original:
A strange island has appeared 
south of Graphics Board Continent!
Nothing like that is meant to exist 
on this server, though. 
We're getting multiple signals from
Digivices coming from there though,
So it's looking like that island is 
the Selectors' hideout. 
We looked further into it, and... 
...apparently it's Archive Island.
translation:
A strange island has appeared 
south of Graphics Board Continent!
Nothing like that is meant to exist 
on this server, though. 
We're getting multiple signals from
Digivices coming from there though,
So it's looking like that island is 
the Selectors' hideout. 
We looked further into it, and... 
...apparently it's Archive Island.

original:
Wait... Archive Island? 
I've heard that name before...
A Digimon from North City was
telling me about it. 
Isn't that the place nobody's ever
been to? The phantom island?
translation:
Wait... Archive Island? 
I've heard that name before...
A Digimon from North City was
telling me about it. 
Isn't that the place nobody's ever
been to? The phantom island?

original:
Yes... rumors say it's existed 
since the birth of the Digital World.
Others say it's where deleted 
Digimon go when destroyed...
I've heard many stories, but I 
never thought it actually existed...
translation:
Yes... rumors say it's existed 
since the birth of the Digital World.
Others say it's where deleted 
Digimon go when destroyed...
I've heard many stories, but I 
never thought it actually existed...

original:
Is there supposed to be something
important or special there?
translation:
Is there supposed to be something
important or special there?

original:
If I remember correctly... the 
Ancient Tree is located there...
It's said to be the original form of
our current Evolution Tree system.
They say that all Digimon were 
originally born on that island...
...and that eventually, they all 
return there...
translation:
If I remember correctly... the 
Ancient Tree is located there...
It's said to be the original form of
our current Evolution Tree system.
They say that all Digimon were 
originally born on that island...
...and that eventually, they all 
return there...

original:
Whoa, that sounds amazing! And 
you get to go see it, ^P!
...oh, sorry. I guess it's not 
exactly a vacation, huh...
translation:
Whoa, that sounds amazing! And 
you get to go see it, ^P!
...oh, sorry. I guess it's not 
exactly a vacation, huh...

original:
I'm sure the Selectors are planning
something there. 
But it's too dangerous for us. 
We'd probably just get in the way. 
We'd have to be Tamers of your 
calibre to be of use there...
...isn't that right, ^P?
translation:
I'm sure the Selectors are planning
something there. 
But it's too dangerous for us. 
We'd probably just get in the way. 
We'd have to be Tamers of your 
calibre to be of use there...
...isn't that right, ^P?

original:
I agree that the Selectors must be
up to something.
Look, ^P, I know you're a 
great Tamer, but just...
Don't let your guard down, alright?
translation:
I agree that the Selectors must be
up to something.
Look, ^P, I know you're a 
great Tamer, but just...
Don't let your guard down, alright?

original:
Good luck, ^P!
Defeat those Selectors...
And save everyone!
translation:
Good luck, ^P!
Defeat those Selectors...
And save everyone!

original:
^P?! 
Asuka's finally back!
She says she's feeling a little 
dazed right now, but...
Oh...!

Um, Hiroyuki just said something
unnecessary and got punched...
translation:
^P?! 
Asuka's finally back!
She says she's feeling a little 
dazed right now, but...
Oh...!

Um, Hiroyuki just said something
unnecessary and got punched...

original:
W-well, at least she doesn't seem 
to have any injuries.
Looks like she's back to normal,
which is a relief to everyone!
However, despite being in that
state for so long...
She claims to know nothing about
Kernel at all...
Isn't that a little weird...?

Not only that, there's something
off about that Kernel guy.
We tried to do some research on 
him, but...
Apparently he's been dead in the
Real World for a very long time.
translation:
W-well, at least she doesn't seem 
to have any injuries.
Looks like she's back to normal,
which is a relief to everyone!
However, despite being in that
state for so long...
She claims to know nothing about
Kernel at all...
Isn't that a little weird...?

Not only that, there's something
off about that Kernel guy.
We tried to do some research on 
him, but...
Apparently he's been dead in the
Real World for a very long time.

original:
It appears the real Kernel, along 
with many of his friends...
Was one of the legendary people 
who created the Digital World.
It's most likely that the Kernel you
met was simply an avatar.
In other words, a copy of himself,
left behind as digital data...
It's possible that he made this 
copy while still alive, and 
ordered it to protect the
Digital World after he died.
translation:
It appears the real Kernel, along 
with many of his friends...
Was one of the legendary people 
who created the Digital World.
It's most likely that the Kernel you
met was simply an avatar.
In other words, a copy of himself,
left behind as digital data...
It's possible that he made this 
copy while still alive, and 
ordered it to protect the
Digital World after he died.

original:
You're heading to South City now,
right, ^P?
We'll take care of Asuka and 
Hiroyuki here at the DigiBase,
So you just focus on finding Yui 
and Takuto, alright?
Oh, and you remember Andromon 
from Tamer Town?
They sent a message to Gatomon
earlier...
It sounds like they've gotten in
some new stock at their shop,
Including some really incredible 
Repair Console tools.
Why don't you check it out next
time you're in Tamer town?
Anyway, good luck!
translation:
You're heading to South City now,
right, ^P?
We'll take care of Asuka and 
Hiroyuki here at the DigiBase,
So you just focus on finding Yui 
and Takuto, alright?
Oh, and you remember Andromon 
from Tamer Town?
They sent a message to Gatomon
earlier...
It sounds like they've gotten in
some new stock at their shop,
Including some really incredible 
Repair Console tools.
Why don't you check it out next
time you're in Tamer town?
Anyway, good luck!

original:
Checking Erase list...
........................
Real Platinum Tamer found!
Real Platinum Tamer found!
Capture the Tamer!
Erase the Digimon!
translation:
Checking Erase list...
........................
Real Platinum Tamer found!
Real Platinum Tamer found!
Capture the Tamer!
Erase the Digimon!

original:
Erasers! Attack Formation C!

Erase!
translation:
Erasers! Attack Formation C!

Erase!

original: Erase!
translation: Erase!

original: Erase!
translation: Erase!

original:
Capture failed.
Capture failed.
translation:
Capture failed.
Capture failed.

original:
First strike failed!
First strike failed!
translation:
First strike failed!
First strike failed!

original:
Retreat to the second defence line.

Retreat to the second defence line.
translation:
Retreat to the second defence line.

Retreat to the second defence line.

original:
Be careful, ^P.
Something's not right.
translation:
Be careful, ^P.
Something's not right.

original:
Your current status is being 
broadcast to the DigiBase now.
Everyone's cheering you on while
watching the screen, but...
I have no clue who's broadcasting 
it, or why...
......
......
Don't let down your guard, ok?
translation:
Your current status is being 
broadcast to the DigiBase now.
Everyone's cheering you on while
watching the screen, but...
I have no clue who's broadcasting 
it, or why...
......
......
Don't let down your guard, ok?

original:
Platinum Tamer approaching!
Platinum Tamer approaching!
Stop the Platinum Tamer using
any means necessary!
Erasers! Last Attack Formation D!
Erase!
translation:
Platinum Tamer approaching!
Platinum Tamer approaching!
Stop the Platinum Tamer using
any means necessary!
Erasers! Last Attack Formation D!
Erase!

original: Erase!
translation: Erase!

original: Erase!
translation: Erase!

original:
Last Attack Failed!
Last Attack Failed!
translation:
Last Attack Failed!
Last Attack Failed!

original:
Failure to prevent breakthrough.
Failure to prevent breakthrough.
translation:
Failure to prevent breakthrough.
Failure to prevent breakthrough.

original:
Erasers, retreat.
Erasers, retreat.
translation:
Erasers, retreat.
Erasers, retreat.

original:
Erasure is... freedom...
Erasure is... liberation...
Everything is for... the sake of...
the great Selectors...
translation:
Erasure is... freedom...
Erasure is... liberation...
Everything is for... the sake of...
the great Selectors...

original:
Erasure is... happiness...
Erasure is... eternal...
Everything is for... the sake of...
our mother, the Ancient Tree...
translation:
Erasure is... happiness...
Erasure is... eternal...
Everything is for... the sake of...
our mother, the Ancient Tree...

original: Erasure complete...!!!
translation: Erasure complete...!!!

original:
Hey there, ^P...

Welcome to the Ancient Tree, 
where evolution is governed.
All those who we captured from
the Colosseum...
They're all part of the Selectors,
now.
Their first task was to erase... 
themselves.
Only by abandoning everything
unnecessary, throwing it away,
Can they become chosen beings
like us Selectors.
translation:
Hey there, ^P...

Welcome to the Ancient Tree, 
where evolution is governed.
All those who we captured from
the Colosseum...
They're all part of the Selectors,
now.
Their first task was to erase... 
themselves.
Only by abandoning everything
unnecessary, throwing it away,
Can they become chosen beings
like us Selectors.

original:
I've only ever told you the truth.

If the Tamer Union exists to
protect this world,
Then it is we Selectors that are 
the new Tamer Union.
All Tamers and Digimon will be
turned into their ideal forms...
That's right, into Erasers...
Isn't it just wonderful...?
translation:
I've only ever told you the truth.

If the Tamer Union exists to
protect this world,
Then it is we Selectors that are 
the new Tamer Union.
All Tamers and Digimon will be
turned into their ideal forms...
That's right, into Erasers...
Isn't it just wonderful...?

original:
Well, I'm sure you'll understand
soon enough.
...once you become one with us,
that is.
translation:
Well, I'm sure you'll understand
soon enough.
...once you become one with us,
that is.

original:
Sorry, but that's not happening!
Looks like we've finally found you. 
We're going to trash every last
one of your disgusting Selectors,
And we're going to be the Tamers 
who saved the Digital World!
translation:
Sorry, but that's not happening!
Looks like we've finally found you. 
We're going to trash every last
one of your disgusting Selectors,
And we're going to be the Tamers 
who saved the Digital World!

original:
We really should have been more 
suspicious of you, Kernel... 
I can't believe YOU were the boss 
of the Selectors all along.
You're a copy of an engineer that
helped create the Digital World.
Born here, closest to the Ancient 
Tree out of anyone, 
It's that closeness that's allowed 
you to carry out your plans.
But to think you'd aim to destroy
the very world you helped build?!
Damn it...! How did we fall for 
something like this...?!
translation:
We really should have been more 
suspicious of you, Kernel... 
I can't believe YOU were the boss 
of the Selectors all along.
You're a copy of an engineer that
helped create the Digital World.
Born here, closest to the Ancient 
Tree out of anyone, 
It's that closeness that's allowed 
you to carry out your plans.
But to think you'd aim to destroy
the very world you helped build?!
Damn it...! How did we fall for 
something like this...?!

original:
You Numbers don't understand...
You really don't get it at all...
The ones destroying this world 
are Tamers and their Digimon.
All I've done is try to stop them.

Right now, the biggest threat to
the Digital World...
Is the needlessly increasing amount
of garbage data.
If this keeps on, this world will 
collapse completely. To avoid that, 
excess data must go, while useful 
data is given streamlined form.
It is a necessary measure to 
protect the Digital World.
See for yourself... 
their new forms.
translation:
You Numbers don't understand...
You really don't get it at all...
The ones destroying this world 
are Tamers and their Digimon.
All I've done is try to stop them.

Right now, the biggest threat to
the Digital World...
Is the needlessly increasing amount
of garbage data.
If this keeps on, this world will 
collapse completely. To avoid that, 
excess data must go, while useful 
data is given streamlined form.
It is a necessary measure to 
protect the Digital World.
See for yourself... 
their new forms.

original:
Every Eraser is simultaneously 
both Tamer and Digimon. 
Though their data size is roughly 
the same as a single Digimon,
They are more powerful than Gold 
Tamers with 6 Mega level Digimon.
They have no need to undergo
Digivolution, nor Degeneration, 
thus, less stress on the server. 
Everything about them is ideal.
translation:
Every Eraser is simultaneously 
both Tamer and Digimon. 
Though their data size is roughly 
the same as a single Digimon,
They are more powerful than Gold 
Tamers with 6 Mega level Digimon.
They have no need to undergo
Digivolution, nor Degeneration, 
thus, less stress on the server. 
Everything about them is ideal.

original:
Everything about them is ideal?
To who, exactly?
translation:
Everything about them is ideal?
To who, exactly?

original:
I don't know much about specs 
or data size...
But those things... they're neither 
Tamers nor Digimon...
...They're an abomination.
translation:
I don't know much about specs 
or data size...
But those things... they're neither 
Tamers nor Digimon...
...They're an abomination.

original:
Whether Erasers are good or evil, 
I couldn't care less...
But wiping out weak Digimon?
That, I can never forgive you for!
How are you protecting the Digital 
World while wiping out Digimon?
This world, it exists FOR the 
Digimon! All of them! 
Digimon don't exist for the sake 
of the Digital World!
translation:
Whether Erasers are good or evil, 
I couldn't care less...
But wiping out weak Digimon?
That, I can never forgive you for!
How are you protecting the Digital 
World while wiping out Digimon?
This world, it exists FOR the 
Digimon! All of them! 
Digimon don't exist for the sake 
of the Digital World!
